name: Statutory or common-law remedies
text: [§514E-12.5]  Statutory or common-law remedies.  Nothing in this chapter shall limit any statutory or common-law right of any person to bring any action in any court for any act involved in the development, sale, exchange, or purchase of a time share interest, or right of the State to punish any person for any violation of law. [L 1981, c 81, pt of §1]
